DOC.criteria: Premenopausal ( 4553 year ) OR postmenopausal 5057 year BMI > 18.5 < 30 Sedentary ( regular physical activity last 2 year ) Plasma measurement Premenopausal : estradiol > 0.20 nmol/l , Follicle stimulate hormone < 22 IU/l progesterone > 2.5 nmol/l Postmenopausal : estradiol < 0.20 nmol/l , Follicle stimulate hormone > 22 IU/l progesterone 0.32.5 nmol/l Smoking Excessive alcohol intake Regular medication include hormone replacement treatment Chronic disease
